alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 10:32PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...PATCHY FOG ACROSS THE MIDDLE AND UPPER KEYS... Patchy fog will continue overnight across parts of the Middle and Upper Keys. Visibilities will be locally reduced to 2 miles or less, with isolated visibilities below 1 mile at times. Low visibilities will be most likely to occur on bridges. Motorists are advised to drive with caution, especially on bridges, as visibilities may change rapidly in short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering fog. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
